# Interactive component

The following map contains a list of crimes near Columbia (within 1km). Each dot indicates a reported crime (data filtered per the steps described in the "Data" section).

    async function getData(){
    const rep= await fetch("./NYC_Crime_Group32/data/columbia_short.csv")
    const data= await rep.text();
    let fin=[]
    const table=data.split('\n').slice(1)
    table.forEach(row=>{
        const colums=row.split(',');
        tab=[parseFloat(colums[0]), parseFloat(colums[1])]
        //console.log(tab)
        //locations.push(tab)
        fin.push(tab)  
        });
        //console.log(fin)
        return fin
    }

    marker = new google.maps.Marker({
